title: Software Engineer
jobDescription: Design, develop, and maintain web applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
qualifications: B.Tech in Computer Science, 2+ years experience with React and Node.js

title: Data Analyst
jobDescription: Analyze datasets to discover patterns and actionable insights for the business. Prepare visualizations and reports for management.
qualifications: Bachelor's in Statistics or related field, Proficiency in SQL and Power BI

title: Marketing Manager
jobDescription: Lead marketing campaigns, manage budgets, and oversee content strategy to increase brand presence.
qualifications: MBA in Marketing, 5+ years experience in consumer marketing

title: UX Designer
jobDescription: Create user-friendly interfaces, conduct usability testing, and support the product team with design assets.
qualifications: Degree in Design or relevant field, Portfolio showcasing web/mobile designs

title: Sales Executive
jobDescription: Drive sales for tech solutions, build client relationships, and achieve quarterly targets.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree, Strong communication skills, Previous sales experience

title: HR Coordinator
jobDescription: Support talent acquisition, onboard new employees, and manage HR documentation.
qualifications: Diploma/degree in HR, Familiarity with HR software

title: Product Manager
jobDescription: Define product vision, plan releases, and coordinate between engineering and business teams.
qualifications: Bachelor's in Engineering, 3+ years PM experience

title: Cybersecurity Specialist
jobDescription: Monitor network security, respond to incidents, and implement best cybersecurity practices.
qualifications: Certification in Cybersecurity, 4+ years of relevant experience
